price: Monhwε na moammεn adwaman, efrisε εyε ahohwisεm ne ͻkwan bͻne paa.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
